original_text: Of the children of Asher after their families: of Jimna, the family of the Jimnites: of Jesui, the family of the Jesuites: of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.
korean_text: 아셀 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 임나에게서 난 임나 종족과 이스위에게서 난 이스위 종족과 브리아에게서 난 브리아 종족이며

sentences.original_text: Of the children of Asher after their families:
of Jimna, the family of the Jimnites:
of Jesui, the family of the Jesuites:
of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.
